title: Could Farage Pullback Help Lib Dems? (with Laura Gordon)
itunes:title: Could Farage Pullback Help Lib Dems? (with Laura Gordon)
description:
Liberal Democrat candidate Laura Gordon tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Sebastian Salek, that the Conservatives and the Brexit Party have struck a "dirty deal", which will spur moderate Tories to vote Lib Dem. Plus, Resolution Foundation CEO Torsten Bell says Boris Johnson could afford to borrow a few more billion pounds to cut taxes, but it's not a good idea.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
